resources.registrationVerificationEmail.subject: Welcome to Open Music Academy!
resources.registrationVerificationEmail.text:
Welcome!

You have registered with Open Music Academy as {displayName}.
Please complete your registration using the following code:

{verificationCode}

The code remains valid for {minutes, plural, =1 {one minute} other {# minutes}}.
resources.registrationVerificationEmail.html:
Welcome!

Please complete your registration using the following code:

resources.passwordResetEmail.subject: Your password for Open Music Academy
resources.passwordResetEmail.text:
Hello {displayName}!

You have requested a password reset on Open Music Academy.
To assign a new password, please follow this link: {completionLink}
The link remains valid for {hours, plural, =1 {one hour} other {# hours}}.
resources.passwordResetEmail.html:
Hello {displayName}!

You have requested a password reset on Open Music Academy.
To assign a new password, please follow this link: change password.
The link remains valid for {hours, plural, =1 {one hour} other {# hours}}.

resources.registrationVerificationEmail.subject: Willkommen auf Open Music Academy!
resources.registrationVerificationEmail.text:
Willkommen!

Du hast dich als {displayName} auf Open Music Academy registriert.
Bitte schließe deine Registrierung mit dem folgendem Code ab:

{verificationCode}

Der Code bleibt {minutes, plural, =1 {eine Minute} other {# Minuten}} gültig.

resources.passwordResetEmail.subject: Dein Kennwort auf Open Music Academy
resources.passwordResetEmail.text:
Hallo {displayName}!

Du hast das Zurücksetzen deines Kennworts auf Open Music Academy angefordert.
Zur Vergabe eines neuen Kennworts folge bitte diesem Link: {completionLink}
Der Link bleibt {hours, plural, =1 {eine Stunde} other {# Stunden}} gültig.
